| --- | --- | --- |
| **Commissioning Checklist** | **Yes/No** | **Remarks** |
| **Quality** |  |  |
| 1. Is the equipment made from suitable material? |  |  |
| 1. Does is meet standards for foreign body control? |  |  |
| 1. Any loose or moving parts? |  |  |
| 1. Does it contain glass/brittle plastic? (If yes, has it been included on glass and brittle plastic register?) |  |  |
| 1. Is there a maintenance plan in place? |  |  |
| 1. Is there a cleaning schedule in place? |  |  |
| 1. Are all lubricants used for equipment food grade? |  |  |
| 1. Is there a pest risk? |  |  |
| 1. Has the new equipment been covered by the HACCP Plan? |  |  |
| 1. Are updates required of any other procedures that are affected by the equipment :  * Operating procedures * Cleaning protocols * Environmental monitoring * Maintenance schedules * Internal audits |  |  |
| **Production** |  |  |
| 1. Is there sufficient space for new equipment? |  |  |
| 1. Is there a requirement for training or additional skills? |  |  |
| 1. Are spare parts easily available? |  |  |
| 1. Is the capacity adequate? |  |  |
| 1. Will it meet sensible efficiencies? |  |  |
| 1. Functional (operational) parameters, specifications, limits and tolerances can be met to achieve the required performance. |  |  |
| **New Product Development** |  |  |
| 1. Will it manufacture a different product type? |  |  |
| 1. Are there new product and process specifications in place? |  |  |
